name: NRKP3News
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Hourly news from NRK P3 from 07:00 to 17:00, Monday through Friday. The audio content is in Norwegian language.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
